gurmukhi: sRI rGunMdn kI Buj ky jb Cor srwsn bwn aufwny ] BUMim Akws pqwr chUM ck pUr rhy nhI jwq pCwny ]
transliteration: Sriraghounandan Kibhuj Ke Jab Chhodh Saraasan Baan Udaane|| Bhoonm(i) Akaas Pataar Chahoon Chak Poor Rahe Nahijaat Pachhaade||
translation: When the arrows were discharged form the hands of Ram the earth, sky, netherworld and four directions could hardly be recognized;

gurmukhi: qor snwh subwhn ky qn Awh krI nhI pwr prwny ] Cod krotn Etn kot Atwnmo jwnkI bwn pCwny ]616]
transliteration: Tor Sanaah Soubaahan Ke Tan Aah Karinahipaar Paraane|| Chhed Darotan Otan Kot Ataanamo Jaanakibaan Pachhaade||616||
translation: Those arrows, piercing through the armours of warriors and killing them without the utterance of a sigh, they penetrated to the other side, when the arrows fell after piercing the steel-armours, Sita realized that these arrows were discharged by Ram.616.

gurmukhi: sRI Asurwrdn ky kr ko ijn eyk hI bwn ibKY qn cwKXo ] Bwj srXo n iBrXo hT kY Bt eyk hI Gwie Drw pr rwKXo ]
transliteration: Sriasuraardan Ke Kar Ko Jin Ek Hihaan Bikhai Tan Chaakhyo|| Bhaaj Sakyo Na Bhiryo Haath Kai Bhat Ek Highaae Dharaa Par Raakhyo||
translation: He, who was struck by arrows of Ram, that warrior could neither run away from that place nor could fight but fell dead on the ground.

gurmukhi: Cyd snwh subwhn ko sr Etn kot krotn nwKXo ] suAwr juJwr Apwr hTI rn hwr igry Dr hwie n BwKXo ]617]
transliteration: Chhed Sanaah Soubaahan Ko Sar Otan Kot Darotan Naakhyo|| Suaar Jujhaar Apaar Hathiran Haar Gire Dhar Haae Na Bhaakhyo||617||
translation: The arrows of Ram pierced through the armour of warriors and then mighty fighters fell down on the earth without uttering a sign.617.

gurmukhi: Awn Ary su mry sBhI Bt jIq bcy rn Cwif prwny ] dyv Adyvn ky ijqIXw rn kot hqy kr eyk n jwny ]
transliteration: Aandare Su Mae Sabh-hibhat Jeet Bache Ran Chhaad(i) Paraane|| Dev Adevan Ke Jiteeyaa Ran Kot Hate Kar Ek Naa Jaane||
translation: Ravana called all his warriors, but those remaining fighters fled away; Ravna killed millions of gods and demons, but it made no difference in the battlefield.

gurmukhi: sRI rGurwj pRwkRm ko lK qyj sMbUh sBY Bhrwny ] Etn kUd krotn PwND su lMkih Cwif iblMk isDwny ]618]
transliteration: Sriraghuraaj Praakram Ko Lakh Tej Sanbooh Sabhai Bhahraane|| Otan Kood Darotan Phaandh Su Lankah(i) Chhaadh Bilank Sidhaane||618||
translation: Seeing the power of Ram the illustrious persons were perturbed and jumping over the walls of the citadel, they ran away.618.

gurmukhi: rwvn ros BrXo rn mo gih bIs hUM bwih hQXwr pHwry ] BUMim Akws idsw ibidsw cik cwr ruky nhI jwq inhwry ]
transliteration: Raavan Ros Bdaryo Ran Mo Gad(i) Bees Hoon Baah(i) Hathyaar Prahaae|| Bhoonm(i) Akaas Disaa Bidisaa Chak(i) Chaar Rouke Nahijaat Nihdare||
translation: In great fury Ravana attacked with weapons from all the twenty arms and with his blows the earth, sky and all the four directions became invisible;

gurmukhi: Pokn qY Pl qY m`D qY AD qY bD kY rx mMfl fwry ] CMqR Dujw br bwj rQI rQ kwit sBY rGurwj auqwry ]619]
transliteration: Phokan Tai Phal Tai Maddh Tai Adh Tai Badh Kai Ran Mandal Ddare|| Chhattra Hujaa Bar Baaj Rathirath Kaattee Sabhai Raghuraaj Outdare||619||
translation: Ram threw away the enemies from the war-arena, chopping them easily like a fruit. Ram chopped and threw all the canopies, banners, horses and charioteers belonging to Ravana.619.

gurmukhi: rwvn caup clXo cpkY inj bwj ibhIn jbY rQ jwnXo ] Fwl qiRsUl gdw brCI gih sRI rGunMdn so rn TwnXo ]
transliteration: Raavan Chaoup Chadyo Chapkai Nij Baaj Biheen Jabai Rath Jaanyo|| Dhaal Trousool Gadaa Barchhigad(i) Sriraghounandan So Ran Thaanyo||
translation: When Ravana saw his chariot deprived of the horses, he marched forward quickly and holding his shield, trident mace and spear in his hands he fought with Ram.

gurmukhi: Dwie ptXo llkwr hTI kp puMjn ko kCu qRws n mwnXo ] AMgd Awid hnvMq qy lY Bt kot huqy kr eyk n jwnXo ]620]
transliteration: Dhaae Daryo Lalkaar Hathikap Pounjan Ko Kachh(u) Traas Na Maanyo|| Anad Aadh Hanvant Te Lai Bhat Kot Houte Kar Ek Na Jaanyo||620||
translation: The persistent Ravana, without any fear of the forces of the monkeys; moved forward fearlessly, shouting violently. There were many warriors those like Angad, Hanuman etc., but he did not fear anyone.620.

gurmukhi: rwvn ko rGurwj jbY rx mMfl Awvq m`iD inhwrXo ] bIs islw isq swiek lY kir kopu bfo aur m`D pHwrXo ]
transliteration: Raavan Ko Raghuraaj Jabai Ran Mandal Aavat Maddh(i) Nihdaryo|| Bis Silaa Sit Saaik Lai Kar(i) Kop(u) Bado Ur Maddh Prahdaryo||
translation: When the king of Raghava clan saw Ravna coming forward, he (Ram) attacked him by discharging his twenty arrows like slabs on his chest.

gurmukhi: Byd cly mrm s`Ql ko sr sRox ndI sr bIc pKwrXo ] Awgy hI ryNg clXo hiT kY Bt Dwm ko BUl n nwm aucwrXo ]621]
transliteration: Bhed Chale Marm Satthal Ko Sar Sron Nadisar Beech Pakhdaryo|| Aage Hireng Chadyo Hath(i) Kai Dhaam Ko Bhool Na Naam Ouchdaryo||621||
translation: These arrows penetrated through his vital parts and he bathed in the stream of blood. Ravana fell down and crawled forward, he forgot even the location of his house.621.

gurmukhi: ros BrXo rn mO rGunwQ su pwn ky bIc srwsn lY kY ] pwNck pwie htwie dXo iqh bIshUM bwNih ibnw Eh kY kY ]
transliteration: Ros Bdaryo Ran Mau Raghounaath Su Paan Ke Beech Saraasan Lai Kai Paanchak Paae Hataae Dayo Tih Bees-hoon Baanh(i) Binaa Oh Kai Kai||
translation: Ram, the king of Raghava clan, in great fury, taking his bow in his hand and taking five steps backward, chopped all his twenty arms;

gurmukhi: dY ds bwn ibmwn dso isr kwt dey isv lok pTY kY ] sRI rGurwj brXo sIA ko bhuro jnu ju`D suXMbr jY kY ]622]
transliteration: Dai Das Baan Bimaan Daso Sir Kaat Dae Siv Lok Padhhai Kai|| Sriraghuraaj Daryo Seea Ko Bahuro Jan(u) Juddh Suyanbar Jai Kai||622||
translation: With ten arrows be chopped his ten heads for dispatching them to the abode of Shiva; after the war Ram wedded Sita again as if he had conquered her in the ceremony of Swayyamvara.622.
